external_games.name: Dragon Ball Z: Shin Saiya-jin Zetsumetsu Keikaku - Chikyuu-hen

name: Dragon Ball Z: Shin Saiya-jin Zetsumetsu Keikaku - Chikyuu-hen
summary: Dragon Ball Z: Shin Saiya-jin Zetsumetsu Keikaku - Chikyuu-hen is a video game released only in Japan on September 23, 1994. It is the first part of the Dragon Ball Z Side Story: True Plan to Eradicate the Saiyans series released on Playdia.
